replies.reply: You see you are in a room with a door, a mailbox and a window.

There is a letter in the mailbox. It reads:
You are about to die.
You throw the letter away
Welcome to the text adventure! This is a template of a game you can make.
What kind of use do you think it has to go to that window? Anyways, you see man man walking to your door.

You open the door. A man stands in front of you and smile while he shoots you with a .50AE L7 Desert Eagle.
The end.
yes.
make a better story by downloading the file and changing adventure.json. Have fun!
